page.title: 12EDUCATION.
page.content: There are 7 classes in my primary and 22 children in my class. We learn Maths, English & Social Studies. I like Maths and gym best. Visiting teachers take gym,art and music. 5 girls learn violin. You can have dinner at school or bring a packed lunch. We have three playtimes,staying indoors if rainy. We can buy crisps and all children get free milk. On Friday we have a service and sings hymns and pray. We get sewing, craft work and homework but not on Friday. Sometimes we go on school trips to a zoo or museum or once to a Post Office. We have a sale and a Christmas Party. There are T.V> programmes, films and video tapes and we have a library. In summer we get six weeks holiday.
